## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G02600](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G02600)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtHMP42, NAKR1, NPCC6</u>
- **Gene Name:** HEAVY METAL ASSOCIATED PROTEIN 42, SODIUM POTASSIUM ROOT DEFECTIVE 1, nuclear-enriched phloem companion cell gene 6
- **Description:**   Heavy metal transport/detoxification superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
